name: BugGuide - Dark with some yellow and orange
description: Darkens bugguide.net. I made this for personal use because I frequent the site and it sharply contrasted with other themes I use. Comments are welcome!
additional_info:
v1.4: June 1st, 2012 - Added hover color for yellow links, fixed broken main logo replacement, and restored the taxonomy page.
v1.3: March 15th, 2012 - An update to Firefox revealed some code that I was testing. I removed it.
v1.2: June 13th, 2011 - Missed an obvious section that ensures all text colors change
v1.1: June 12th, 2011 - Fixed table on data tab
v1.0: June 12th, 2011 - Initial release
